title.value: Question Personalization in an Intelligent Tutoring System
title.justification: The title clearly indicates that the research paper focuses on personalizing questions in intelligent tutoring systems.
title.quote: Question Personalization in an Intelligent Tutoring System

extractions.description: The paper investigates the impact of personalization in the phrasing of questions within intelligent tutoring systems (ITS) and the effect such personalization has on student learning outcomes. By creating question variants suitable for students at different levels of proficiency and conducting an experimental A/B test, the authors demonstrate how adapting questions affects learning gains.

type.justification: The study involves experimental A/B testing with real students to evaluate the impact of personalized question phrasing within an ITS, indicating it is empirical.
type.quote: We show that generating versions of the questions suitable for students at different levels of subject proficiency improves student learning gains, using variants written by a domain expert and an experimental A/B test.

name.justification: The paper explores the use of AI in intelligent tutoring systems, which is a part of educational technology.
name.quote: This paper investigates personalization in the field of intelligent tutoring systems (ITS).

name.justification: The study specifically addresses how ITS can be improved through personalized question phrasing.
name.quote: We hypothesize that personalization in question phrasing has not been explored.

name.justification: The dataset consists of students' interactions with the Korbit ITS platform, used to evaluate the model and question variants effectiveness.
name.quote: We isolated 2,137 students’ interactions with the platform. Each student’s history consists of the exercises they encountered and their attempts to solve them.
